Translations.Text: Mi ne worship ki vi worship
Nor do vi worship ki mi worship
Nor vol mi ever worship ki vi worship
Nor vol vi ever worship ki mi worship
Al vi est your religi me est my religi
Vi seg popol embracing di religi en throngs
Vi glor lauxd your Lord implore Him por forgiveness! Li est Redeemer
kondamn est works de Abee Lahab li kondamn
His mon whatever li accomplished neniam help him
Sxi resurrected sxnur dorn her kol
